Find optimal Simon design

find_simon_design.Rd

Searches for the Simon optimal or minimax design meeting constraints. Uses optimized search with early termination.

Usage

find_simon_design(
  p0,
  p1,
  alpha = 0.1,
  beta = 0.2,
  n_max = 100,
  criterion = c("optimal", "minimax")
)

Arguments

p0

Null response rate

p1

Alternative response rate

alpha

Maximum type I error

beta

Maximum type II error (1 - power)

n_max

Maximum total sample size to search

criterion

"optimal" (minimize EN under null) or "minimax" (minimize max N)

Value

Data frame with design parameters and operating characteristics
